text: At this point, it's no secret that we're royally obsessed with Meghan Markle's style. From her first public outing with Prince Harry, the Duchess of Sussex has crafted a minimal, chic, and ultra-modern royal wardrobe. Whether she's wearing a little black dress or a plush wrap coat, the royal brings a bit of understated elegance to all of her looks. In the spirit of channeling her style, we're rounding up all of Meghan's signature pieces and where to shop them. And because most of her looks sell out as soon as she wears them, we also rounded up some alternative options that are sure to get the Meghan stamp of approval. Click through to shop them all.
title: Shop Meghan Markle's Royal Duchess Style
